attributes.action: Give the people of the United Kingdom of Great Britain a referendum on the EU. ''IN OR OUT'!''.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We The people of Great Britain want and require a referendum on the EU.
A vote which would consist of mainly the options ''IN OR OUT''.

As a country which demonstrates and boasts itself worldwide as ''DEMOCRATIC'' we the people are given the right to have our say and are entitled to it.

We urge all ''ELECTED'' Ministers of Parliament to act on this!.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
